## ITiler.getTile() method

Retrieves a tile for a previously registered index.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getTile(indexId: string, tileKey: TileKey): Promise<{}>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  indexId | string | Index identifier. |
|  tileKey | [TileKey](./harp-geoutils.tilekey.md) | The \[\[TileKey\]\] that identifies the tile. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;{}&gt;
